Description:
Detects common command used to enable bpf kprobes tracing

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Enable BPF Kprobes Tracing
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%echo 1 >%' and command like '%/sys/kernel/debug/tracing/events/kprobes/%') and (command like '%/myprobe/enable%' or command like '%/myretprobe/enable%')
